ai
Class AICardEvaluator

java.lang.Object
  ai.AICardEvaluator

public class AICardEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object

Class for handling AI card evaluation for self or other players.

getCardValueToPlayer

public static int getCardValueToPlayer(MonsterCard monster,
                                       Player player,
                                       java.util.LinkedList<Card> handCards)
Evaluates the player's current status and returns the value of the Monster Card to him.

Parameters:
card - the Monster Card to evaluate
player - the player to check
handCards - list of the player's hand cards to evaluate; null, if should treat all hand cards as unknown
Returns:
the current value of the given card to the given player
